content:
https://www.w3.org/WAI/standards-guidelines/wcag/wcag3-intro

WCAG 3 Introduction
Introduces the W3C Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 3.0 Working Draft. WCAG documents explain how to make the web more accessible to people with disabilities.

@jenlampton you mentioned in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4941 that someone emailed you who was having accessibility issues with the block add page. Could you get the same person to comment on the PR on that page?

[UX] Manage blocks interface cannot be used with keyboard navigation 路 Issue #4941 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug We received an email today from someone who is struggling with the manage blocks interface because they can not see. (The following is from a non-English speaker) Hi. I can n...
